publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3926 Gil Paterson on behalf of the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee: Review of Equal Opportunities in the Work of Committees—That the Parliament notes the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee’s 4th Report 2009 (Session 3), Review of equal opportunities in the work of committees (SP Paper 244), and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 24 April 2009. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone*
